channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Keyboard
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Keyboard

item.title: CVE-2023-42579|2023-12-05T02:44:36.992Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20keyboard
item.description: Improper usage of insecure protocol (i.e. HTTP) in SogouSDK of Chinese Samsung Keyboard prior to versions 5.3.70.1 in Android 11, 5.4.60.49, 5.4.85.5, 5.5.00.58 in Android 12, and 5.6.00.52, 5.6.10.42, 5.7.00.45 in Android 13 allows adjacent attackers to access keystroke data using Man-in-the-Middle attack.

item.title: CVE-2024-20871|2024-05-07T04:28:59.636Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20keyboard
item.description: Improper authorization vulnerability in Samsung Keyboard prior to version One UI 5.1.1 allows physical attackers to partially bypass the factory reset protection.
